channel.title: Hs on C'est la Z
channel.description: Recent content in Hs on C'est la Z

item.title: Fall 2018 HS CS Tour
item.description: I've written before about why Hunter College CS is so important for NYC and I've been working hard to develop our Daedalus Scholars honors CS program - a program in which students receive a scholarship along with all sorts of special opportunities to add on to their in class CS education. The program and Hunter CS as a whole have made a lot of progress over the past two years and each year I roll out new special activities and events for my honors students.
